feed.title: Little Model Art Projects
feed.subtitle: my collection of scale modelling, miniatures and other art projects

entry.title: #126 Kyushu J7W1
entry.summary: Building the Kyūshū J7W Shinden 震電, as used by Kōichi Shikishima in Godzilla Minus One to deliver the final fatal blow. No electronics in this one.
entry.content: Building the Kyūshū J7W Shinden 震電, as used by Kōichi Shikishima in Godzilla Minus One to deliver the final fatal blow. No electronics in this one.

entry.title: #120 Hawker Typhoon Mk.Ib on D-Day
entry.summary: Typhoon Ib on ground attack over France 1944. Just a quick build of the nice little Airfix 1:72 kit while other projects drag along on the bench!
entry.content: Typhoon Ib on ground attack over France 1944. Just a quick build of the nice little Airfix 1:72 kit while other projects drag along on the bench!

entry.title: #119 Type 97 ChiHa in Malaya
entry.summary: A Type 97 Chi-Ha チハ roaring down the Malayan peninsula in 1941. This is the old Airfix 1:76 kit with a couple of infantry figures, echoing a pretty well-known picture. No electronics in this one.
entry.content: A Type 97 Chi-Ha チハ roaring down the Malayan peninsula in 1941. This is the old Airfix 1:76 kit with a couple of infantry figures, echoing a pretty well-known picture. No electronics in this one.

entry.title: #108 Bristol Bulldog
entry.summary: The Bristol Bulldog is an RAF classic from the inter-war period. Although this Airfix Vintage Classic 2019 boxing was tooled way back in 1969, it is still a very buildable kit of a very beautiful plane.
entry.content: The Bristol Bulldog is an RAF classic from the inter-war period. Although this Airfix Vintage Classic 2019 boxing was tooled way back in 1969, it is still a very buildable kit of a very beautiful plane.

entry.title: #086 Race To Jitra
entry.summary: Building a double-sided box diorama in mixed scales to capture the rapid advance of Japanese forces during the Invasion of Malaya. The Battle of Jitra was one of many engagements where the advancing force overwhelmed the under-prepared defenders on the peninsula.
entry.content: Building a double-sided box diorama in mixed scales to capture the rapid advance of Japanese forces during the Invasion of Malaya. The Battle of Jitra was one of many engagements where the advancing force overwhelmed the under-prepared defenders on the peninsula.

entry.title: #038 Man Overboard
entry.summary: A little 1:700 diorama in a walnut featuring a little drama while mooring a Mitsubishi F1M2 observation seaplane. Part of the Just Making Conversation podcast Walnut Challenge group build. No electronics in this one.
entry.content: A little 1:700 diorama in a walnut featuring a little drama while mooring a Mitsubishi F1M2 observation seaplane. Part of the Just Making Conversation podcast Walnut Challenge group build. No electronics in this one.

entry.content: Building the Airfix 1:72 Nakajima B5N2 Kate - an exercise in weathering, no electronics.

entry.title: #036 Spitfire Mk.Vc

entry.content: Building a diorama inspired by the box-art of Airfix's 1:72 scale Spitfire Mk.Vc flying over La Sénia Algeria 1942, enhanced with some LED candle effects and targets of opportunity.

entry.title: #034 Vauxhall D-Type Ambulance
entry.summary: Building the wonderful little 1:72 Vauxhall D-Type Ambulance kit from Ukrainian manufacturer Roden. Dedicated to the memory of Valery Grygorenko. Valery created some of the most amazing box art for Roden but tragically he was killed in a Russian attack near his home in March 2022.
entry.content: Building the wonderful little 1:72 Vauxhall D-Type Ambulance kit from Ukrainian manufacturer Roden. Dedicated to the memory of Valery Grygorenko. Valery created some of the most amazing box art for Roden but tragically he was killed in a Russian attack near his home in March 2022.

entry.title: #033 Blackburn Buccaneer S.2C
entry.summary: An excuse to build another sea base - this time for an aircraft - the RN Blackburn Buccaneer S.2C from Airfix in 1:72 scale, tooling around the North Sea at 30ft.
entry.content: An excuse to build another sea base - this time for an aircraft - the RN Blackburn Buccaneer S.2C from Airfix in 1:72 scale, tooling around the North Sea at 30ft.
